Docs.summary: Implements a type converter for converting <xref:System.Double> (used as the value of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.Zoom%2A?displayProperty=fullName>) to and from other types.

Docs.param: The type to which `value` is to be converted. This must be <xref:System.Double> or <xref:System.String>. See Remarks.
The language and culture assumed during the conversion.
Docs.summary: Converts the <xref:System.Double> (used as the value of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.Zoom%2A?displayProperty=fullName>) to an object of the specified type.
Docs.returns:
when the converter cannot produce a value; for example, when is or when is not <xref:System.Double> or <xref:System.String>.
\- or -
The new <xref:System.Object> of the designated type. As implemented in this class, this must be either a <xref:System.Double> or a <xref:System.String>. If it is a string, it will be formatted appropriately for the .

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.UnsetValue> may be returned to indicate that the converter produced no value and that the fallback (if available) or default value should be used instead.
Pass `null` for `parameter`. This parameter is required by the signature of <xref:System.Windows.Data.IValueConverter.Convert%2A>, and is used by some implementations to provide contextual information to the converter; but it is not used in this class.

Docs.param: The object that is to be converted back to a <xref:System.Double>.
The type of `value`. This must be <xref:System.Double> or <xref:System.String>. See Remarks.
The language and culture assumed during the conversion.
Docs.summary: Returns a previously converted value of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.Zoom%2A?displayProperty=fullName> back to a <xref:System.Double> that can be assigned to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.Zoom%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
Docs.returns:
when the converter cannot produce a value; for example, when is not a valid percentage when is not <xref:System.Double> or <xref:System.String>.
\- or -
A <xref:System.Double> representing the zoom percentage of a .

remarks.format:
## Remarks The data binding engine calls this method when it moves a value from the binding target to the binding source.
<xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.UnsetValue> may be returned to indicate that the converter produced no value and that the fallback (if available) or default value should be used instead.
Pass `null` for `parameter`. This parameter is required by the signature of <xref:System.Windows.Data.IValueConverter.ConvertBack%2A>, and is used by some implementations to provide contextual information to the converter; but it is not used in this class.
